About the Role


	Kairos Creative Hub is looking for an organized, friendly, and creative professional to manage our front desk while building our online presence.
	You&#39;ll be the face of our company both in-person and online, ensuring exceptional client experiences and engaging social media content.


Key Responsibilities


	Serve as the primary point of contact for clients, visitors, and walk-in customers. Handle in-person and phone inquiries, schedule appointments, and direct visitors appropriately in a timely and professional manner
	Manage content publishing across multiple platforms including Instagram, Facebook, X (Twitter), TikTok, and LinkedIn.

	Track and report on key performance metrics including engagement rates, follower growth, reach, and conversions.
	Welcome guests warmly and professionally, ensuring an exceptional first impression.
	Maintain a clean, organized, and welcoming reception area.
	Provide administrative support to the team as needed


Requirements &amp; Qualifications


	Minimum qualification: OND / HND / Bachelor&#39;s degree or equivalent.
	Previous experience in office administration or social media management is preferred but not required.
	Excellent interpersonal and customer service skills.
	Strong communication skills (written and spoken).
	Creative thinker who can come up with fresh content ideas.
	Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite or Google Workspace.
	Basic familiarity with social media platforms and scheduling tools.
	Ability to work independently with minimal supervision.
	Available to start immediately.


Salary
N80,000 - N100,000 monthly.

Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and a brief cover letter to:&nbsp;kairosoperationsx@gmail.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.",

Research Project Assistant Job at Institute of Genomics and Global Health (IGH)




        
    

        
        The Institute of Genomics and Global Health (IGH) is a pioneering research institute dedicated to advancing public health in Africa and beyond through cutting-edge genomics. Evolving from a decade of groundbreaking infectious disease research as the African Centre of Excellence for Genomics of Infectious Diseases (ACEGID), IGH now expands its impact beyond infectious diseases to cancer, cardiovascular diseases, and precision medicine. Through cutting-edge research, innovation, and capacity building, we are shaping the future of global health.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Research Project Assistant

Job Location: Ede, Osun
Duration: Two-year renewable contract
     

            
    



Key Responsibilities


	Manage Pl's calendar, meetings, and documentation
	Track project timelines, milestones, and deliverables
	Coordinate student research projects (BSc, MSc, PhD)
	Support grant documentation, reporting, and compliance
	Assist with budget tracking and financial summaries
	Support staff coordination and performance documentation


Requirements


	Bachelor's Degree in Life Sciences, Project Management, Administration, or related field
	MSc in Life Sciences is an added advantage
	Strong organisational and communication skills
	Proficiency in Microsoft Office/Google Workspace
	Ability to handle confidential information.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their Cover Letter & Resume to: hr.acegid@run.edu.ng using "Research Project Assistant" as the subject of the email.

title: Cashier Job at Just Recruitment Agency
content:
Just Recruitment Agency specialized services encompass a wide range of industries, including but not limited to IT, finance, sales, marketing, HR, and more. Whether your company operates in a niche market or a large-scale industry, our freelance recruitment agency have the expertise to source top talent that aligns with your specific requirements.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Cashier
Job Location: By GTBank, Opposite AP Filling Station, Apo District, Abuja
Employment Type: Full-time
Work Schedule: Work one day in, one day out (Approximately 15 working days monthly)

Job Summary
     

            
    




	The Cashier will be responsible for handling customer payments, processing sales transactions accurately, maintaining proper cash records, and delivering excellent customer service. The role requires computer literacy, dedication, honesty, and strong attention to detail.


Role Responsibilities


	Process customer payments (cash, transfer, POS, and other payment methods)
	Operate POS systems and billing software
	Issue receipts and invoices accurately
	Handle cash responsibly and securely
	Balance cash at the end of each shift
	Maintain accurate transaction records
	Provide polite and professional customer service
	Assist customers with inquiries
	Support store operations when needed
	Maintain cleanliness and organization of cashier area
	Report discrepancies immediately
	Follow company cash-handling procedures


Ideal Candidate Profile


	A dedicated, computer-literate cashier who is reliable, detail-oriented, customer-friendly, and capable of
	handling sales transactions accurately while maintaining high service standards and financial integrity.


Skills & Competencies:


	Cash handling
	POS operation
	Customer service
	Accuracy and attention to detail
	Record keeping
	Time management
	Reliability
	Professional conduct Requirements:
	Must be computer literate
	Must show strong dedication and commitment to work
	Good numerical ability
	Strong attention to detail
	Good customer service skills
	Honest, responsible, and trustworthy
	Ability to work under pressure
	Good communication skills
	Previous cashier/retail experience is an advantage.


Salary
N55,000 - N60,000 per month. 

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their applications to: jravacancies652@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

content:
Just Recruitment Agency  specialized services encompass a wide range of industries, including but not limited to IT, finance, sales, marketing, HR, and more. Job Position: Accountant

Job Location: Abuja (FCT) 
Employment Type: Full-time
Work Schedule: Monday – Friday;  No weekend work (Saturday & Sunday off)
Start Date: Immediate

Job Summary
     

            
    




	The Accountant will be responsible for managing financial records, tracking income and expenses, preparing financial reports, supporting financial planning, and ensuring accurate accounting processes.
	The role requires strong computer literacy, dedication, financial discipline,and retail accounting experience.


Ideal Candidate Profile


	A dedicated, computer-literate accountant with a minimum of 2 years experience, strong financial discipline, excellent attention to detail, and the ability to manage supermarket financial operations effectively while ensuring accuracy, compliance, and transparency.


Role Responsibilities


	Maintain accurate financial records and books of accounts
	Record daily sales, income, and expenses
	Prepare daily, weekly, and monthly financial reports
	Manage cash flow and expense tracking
	Reconcile accounts and financial statements
	Monitor payments, invoices, and receipts
	Track supplier payments and outstanding balances
	Support budgeting and financial planning
	Ensure proper documentation and record-keeping
	Prepare payroll support data when required
	Support audits and financial reviews
	Ensure compliance with financial policies and procedures
	Detect financial discrepancies and report appropriately
	Use accounting software and digital tools for records


Requirements


	Minimum of 2 years of experience in accounting (retail/supermarket experience is an advantage)
	Must be computer literate
	Must show strong dedication and commitment to work
	Good knowledge of basic accounting principles
	Good numerical and analytical skills
	Strong attention to detail
	Good record-keeping ability
	Honest, responsible, and trustworthy
	Ability to work independently and meet deadlines.


Skills & Competencies:


	Financial reporting
	Bookkeeping
	Cash flow management
	Data entry accuracy
	Financial analysis
	Time management
	Organization skills
	Problem-solving

N150,000 - N180,000 monthly.
